<h1 class="post-title">
<span class="the-title">Seizing Everything: The Theft of the Global Commons – Part 1</span> </h1>
<div class="post-author">
<a href="https://off-guardian.org/author/admin/" title="All posts by Editor">Editor</a> </div>
</div>
<div class="post_page-content post">
<h6>Iain Davis</h6>
<a href="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows.jpg?x46269"><img alt="" class="aligncenter size-offg-header-image wp-image-68709" decoding="async" height="900" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" src="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows.jpg?x46269" srcset="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows.jpg 1600w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows-500x281.jpg 500w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows-1400x788.jpg 1400w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows-768x432.jpg 768w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/wef-in-shadows-800x450.jpg 800w" width="1600"/></a>
<h3 style="font-size: 150%; margin-bottom: 0;">Audio Version <span style="color: RGB(150,0,50)"><sup>New Feature!</sup></span></h3>
<div class="audio-container" style="margin-top: 0.5rem;">
<!--[if lt IE 9]><script>document.createElement('audio');</script><![endif]-->
<audio class="wp-audio-shortcode" controls="controls" id="audio-78826-1" preload="none" style="width: 100%;"><source src="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/Seizing-Everything-The-Theft-of-the-Global-Commons-–-Part-1-Edit-1-MONO.mp3?_=1" type="audio/mpeg"/><a href="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/Seizing-Everything-The-Theft-of-the-Global-Commons-–-Part-1-Edit-1-MONO.mp3">https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/Seizing-Everything-The-Theft-of-the-Global-Commons-–-Part-1-Edit-1-MONO.mp3</a></audio>
</div>
<p class="dropcap">The people who none of us elect, who ultimately control international finance, all corporate &amp; business activity, government policy and international relations have constructed a system that will enable them to seize the <em>“global commons.”</em></p>
<p>They are the <a href="https://in-this-together.com/what-is-the-global-public-private-partnership/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Global Public Private Partnership</a> (GPPP) and while elected representatives are within their ranks, they don’t set either the agenda or policy. We need to both recognise who the GPPP are and understand the implications of their gambit. How are this group of global stakeholders going to seize the <em>global commons</em> and why should we resist them?</p>
<p>Over the next couple of articles we are going to explore these questions. By recognising what the globalist think tanks and other policy makers mean by the <em>global commons</em> we can begin to appreciate the jaw dropping magnitude of their ambitions.</p>
<p>They consistently use deceptive language to conceal their intentions. Words like <em>‘inclusive,’ ‘sustainable,’ ‘equity’</em> and ‘resilience’ are often employed to portray some vague but ultimately duplicitous concept of caring environmentalism. We must unpick their language to fully comprehend their intentions, in the hope that we <a href="https://in-this-together.com/inalienable-rights/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">can resist and deny them</a>.</p>
<p>While we have been distracted and transitioned by the alleged global pandemic, or <a href="https://in-this-together.com/pseudopandemic/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">pseudopandemic</a>, the Global Public Private Partnership (GPPP), who orchestrated the chaos, have been very busy. They have created the asset rating system that will afford them total, global economic control. This is based upon Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and utilises <a href="https://www.weforum.org/stakeholdercapitalism" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Stakeholder Capitalism Metrics</a> (SCM).</p>
<a href="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/internetaccess.jpg?x46269"><img alt="" class="aligncenter size-offg-body-image-650 wp-image-78864" decoding="async" height="324" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px" src="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/internetaccess-650x324.jpg?x46269" srcset="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/internetaccess-650x324.jpg 650w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/internetaccess-500x249.jpg 500w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/internetaccess.jpg 750w" width="650"/></a>
<p>This new global economic system is what the politicians mean by <em>“build back better.”</em> It is the essence of the World Economic Forum’s <a href="https://straight2point.info/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/COVID-19_-The-Great-Reset-Klaus-Schwab.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Great Reset</a>.</p>
<p>laying the foundations for a new International Monetary and Financial System (IMFS) was a key to the <em>pseudopandemic</em>. The new IMFS will emerge from the deliberate economic destruction wrought by government policy responses to COVID 19. This was planned.</p>
<p>The phrase <em>“build back better”</em> was first widely popularised by US President Clinton following the 2004 Indonesian tsunami. During the pseudopandemic it has been adopted by politicians globally to signal that the project to seize the <em>“global commons”</em> is underway.</p>
<p>We will need to consider UN Agenda 21 and 2030 in more detail, as these are key the theft of all resources, but for now we can reference it to understand what <em>“build back better”</em> actually means. This will explain why politicians around the world have used it.</p>
<p>Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 11 (b) of Agenda 2030 states:</p>
<blockquote><p>By 2020, substantially increase the number of cities and human settlements adopting and implementing integrated policies and plans towards.. adaptation to climate change, resilience to disasters, and develop and implement, in line with the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, holistic disaster risk management at all levels.”</p></blockquote>
<p>The Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction (SFDRR), written in 2015, states:</p>
<div class="transcript">
<p>The recovery, rehabilitation and reconstruction phase, which needs to be prepared ahead of a disaster, is a critical opportunity to Build Back Better; recognition of stakeholders and their roles; mobilization of risk-sensitive investment to avoid the creation of new risk;</p>
<p>[…] strengthening of international cooperation and global partnership […] it is necessary to continue strengthening good governance in disaster risk reduction strategies at the national, regional and global levels […] and to use post-disaster recovery and reconstruction to ‘Build Back Better’, supported by strengthened modalities of international cooperation…</p>
<p>Clear vision, plans, competence, guidance and coordination within and across sectors, as well as participation of relevant stakeholders, are needed.. and fosters collaboration and partnership across mechanisms and institutions for the implementation of instruments relevant to disaster risk reduction and sustainable development.</p></div>
<p><em>“Build back better”</em> policy was prepared ahead of the arrival of COVID-19. It is part of the planned risk management and preparedness framework for post <em>“disaster”</em> reconstruction. It means the global <em>participation of relevant stakeholders </em>to strengthen <em>international cooperation and global partnerships </em>in order to<em> implement instruments </em>to achieve<em> sustainable development. </em></p>
<p>SDG 11 (b) was a plan to <em>substantially increase </em>the global number of<em> human settlements</em> adopting <em>“build back better”</em> polices by 2020. This SDG has now been achieved thanks to the COVID-19 <em>pseudopandemic</em>. In particular, the planned <em>“mobilization of risk-sensitive investment,” </em>outlined in the SFDRR, has surged ahead.</p>
<p><a href="https://archive.is/pC6o4" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Stakeholder Capitalism Metrics</a> – SCM – were devised by the World Economic Forum, who describe themselves as the international organisation for public-private cooperation. When combined with the SDGs outlined in the UN Agenda 21 and 2030 frameworks, SCM enable the GPPP to seize the entire Earth, all its resources and everything on it, including us.</p>
<p>In order to control us we are being transitioned into a technocracy with the <a href="https://d-dean.medium.com/biosecurity-and-politics-giorgio-agamben-396f9ab3b6f4" rel="noopener" target="_blank">biosecurity state</a> acting as the central control mechanism. Public health is the new focus for global security and centralised control of the entire system has been established during, and as a result of, the <a href="https://www.ukcolumn.org/article/there-is-no-pandemic" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><em>pseudopandemic</em></a>.</p>
<p>The news IMFS is designed to tie our biosecurity commitments to Universal Basic Income (UBI or similar state payments) which will be paid with <a href="https://archive.is/B7i5g" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Central Bank Digital Currency</a> (CBDC.) </p>
<p>This will ensure our compliance, as Central Banks will use AI algorithms, combined with population monitoring (track and trace, vaccine passports or some other form of <a href="https://archive.is/uRMQl" rel="noopener" target="_blank">social credit</a> surveillance system), to monitor and control all of our transactions, behaviour and movements.</p>
<p>The dreaded authoritarian <em>knock on the door</em> will be replaced with the dreaded authoritarian <em>beep of a refused card payment</em>. If you can’t buy food with your money it doesn’t really matter how much of it you have. Comply or starve is a distinct possibility.</p>
<p>Over the next couple of articles we are going to explore this <em>“new abnormal.” </em>How it encapsulates the seizure of everything by favoured <em>stakeholder capitalists</em>, as the chosen winning corporations divide up the Earths resources amongst themselves. This is the zenith of the planned <em>“build back better”</em> response to the pseudopandemic.</p>
<p>Throughout the pseudopandemic the World Economic Forum (WEF) have taken the <a href="https://in-this-together.com/bernays-the-danger-of-public-relations/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">public relations</a> lead on the planned recovery. Their <em>Great Reset</em> is just the repackaging of an idea hundreds, if not thousands of years old.</p>
<p>It is the self-serving belief that some <em>special</em> people are destined, and therefore have the right, to lead the rest of us. They don’t require any kind of legitimate <em>“democratic”</em> mandate or even popular support. Their claimed right to rule is an imperious assumption.</p>
<p>The WEF have claimed the supposed right to direct three <em>key areas</em> <a href="https://archive.is/SopFZ" rel="noopener" target="_blank">of global policy</a>. They intend to do this by assisting world leaders to manage <em>“disruptive change.”</em></p>
<p>They have put themselves forward as the GPPP front organisation for managing the fourth industrial revolution, addressing global security issues and solving the problems of the <em>global commons</em>. It is important to note that the WEF are not alone in their ambitions, but rather the leading proponents for the wider GPPP policy platform. We will focus on the third sphere of their self-proclaimed authority: control of a global commons.</p>
<p>The United Nations (UN) acts as a policy hub for the GPPP. It allows stakeholders to introduce the policies, formulated by the think tanks, into the nascent global governance structure. The desired policy agendas can be moulded and eventually filtered down to national and then local government administrations across the planet.</p>
<p>In the <a href="https://in-this-together.com/UKC/UN-GC-TPWS.pdf?x38956" rel="noopener" target="_blank">September 2011 issue of Our Planet</a> the UN offered a description of the global commons as <em>“the shared resources that no one owns but all life relies upon.” </em>In 2013 the UN Systems Task Team expanded on this and published<em> “<a href="https://www.un.org/en/development/desa/policy/untaskteam_undf/thinkpieces/24_thinkpiece_global_governance.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Global governance and governance of the global commons in the global partnership for development beyond 2015.</a>“</em></p>
<p>They wrote:</p>
<blockquote><p>International law identifies four global commons, namely the High Seas, the Atmosphere, the Antarctica and the Outer Space…Resources of interest or value to the welfare of the community of nations – such as tropical rain forests and biodiversity – have lately been included among the traditional set of global commons…while some define the global commons even more broadly, including science, education, information and peace…Stewardship of the global commons cannot be carried out without global governance.”</p></blockquote>
<p>This habit of expanding the definition of the global commons has continued. In April 2020 <a href="https://in-this-together.com/a-climate-emergency-fit-for-a-parasite-economy-part-3/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">The Rothschild</a> backed bank <a href="https://www.thegef.org/blog/earth-day-reflecting-global-commons-we-share" rel="noopener" target="_blank">the Global Environment Facility</a> offered a more extensive list of the <em>shared resources all life relies upon</em>:</p>
<blockquote><p>In order to protect our global commons.. humanity must develop new ways of doing business to deliver transformational change in food, energy, urban, and production and consumption systems. It will take coalitions that bring together governments, businesses, finance, and citizens to realize this goal.”</p></blockquote>
<p>That coalition is the GPPP and citizens are involved, via civil society, only if they agree to promote the agreed policy agenda.</p>
<p>In December 2020 the <a href="https://www.un.org/sg/en/content/sg/speeches/2020-12-02/address-columbia-university-the-state-of-the-planet" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Secretary General of the UN Antonio Gutteres</a> really fleshed out the global commons concept. </p>
<p>Speaking to an audience gathered at Columbia University, the pivotal academic institution in the development of Technocracy, he said:</p>
<div class="transcript">
<p>To put it simply, the state of the planet is broken.. human activities are at the root of our descent towards chaos.. the recovery from the pandemic is an opportunity…It is time to flick the ‘green switch’. We have a chance to not simply reset the world economy but to transform it…We must turn this momentum into a movement… </p>
<p>Everything is interlinked – the global commons and global well-being…This means: More and bigger effectively managed conservation areas… Biodiversity-positive agriculture and fisheries…More and more people are understanding the need for their own daily choices to reduce their carbon footprint and respect planetary boundaries…From protests in the streets to advocacy on-line…From classroom education to community engagement…From voting booths to places of work… </p>
<p>We cannot go back to the old normal…We have a blueprint: the 2030 Agenda, the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris Agreement on climate change…Now is the time to transform humankind’s relationship with the natural world – and with each other.</p></div>
<p>Again we see the recurrent themes of the GPPP. The planet must be saved from us, we are a pestilence that must be controlled; Covid-19 is, as ever, an opportunity to transform the global economy; our survival and GPPP stewardship of the global commons are one and the same and everything must be transformed.</p>
<p>Not only are the oceans (everything in them and beneath them), the atmosphere (the air we breath), Antarctica (the only continent with a universally respected international treaty protecting it) and the universe up for grabs, GPPP avarice doesn’t end there.</p>
<p>Energy (all natural resources), all productivity and our livelihoods (the workplace), biodiversity (ecosystems and life on Earth), all land (managed conservation areas), agriculture and fisheries (all food), our consumption and behaviour (carbon footprints), where we are allowed to exist (planetary boundaries), our political opinions and system, education, the communities we live in and even our relationships, are all to be controlled and transformed by the GPPP.</p>
<p>The <em>“global commons”</em> is GPPP shorthand for everything. All life, all resources, all land, all water, the air, the stars and all of us. It is their intention to have dominion over all.</p>
<p>The global commons are not fixed. Other aspects of our existence are being added all the time. In June 2021 the WEF wrote the <a href="https://archive.is/7FUvC" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Case for a Digital Commons</a>. Whenever they want to include something else in the list they use the language of sustainable development. It doesn’t matter that this makes no rational sense, the point is to sell the notion with the right buzz-words:</p>
<blockquote><p>COVID-19 highlighted and accelerated the centrality of digital technology in our lives. Yet the digital ecosystem is one of the most unequal and dysfunctional aspects of our collective lives. How can we build a digital ecosystem that ensures broadly shared participation and prosperity? We argue that shifting our view to see technology infrastructure as a digital commons could point the way forward for an inclusive and sustainable ecosystem with shared social benefit.”</p></blockquote>
<p>Now they claim the authority to rule the Internet and all digital communication technology. We see once more that the <em>pseudopandemic</em> is the catalyst for this transformation and that government is merely the implementation partner for the GPPP agenda. We are just the tax paying cash cows that will fund the construction of the empire:</p>
<blockquote><p>In this post-pandemic time of broad economic and social re-envisioning and re-alignment, an emphasis on the digital commons can point the way forward for collective recovery, solidarity and progress.. Governments will have to push forward on real regulation of privately controlled systems.. as well as providing funding to allow a sustainable ecosystem of innovation that is not beholden to venture capitalists or large companies.”</p></blockquote>
<p>It is truly remarkable that a <a href="https://www.ukcolumn.org/article/deceptive-construction-why-we-must-question-covid-19-mortality-statistics" rel="noopener" target="_blank">low mortality respiratory disease</a> has provided such an immense opportunity for global transformation. </p>
<p>The leading figures within the GPPP knew that COVID-19 didn’t present much of a threat. In their June 2020 book<em> COVID-19: The Great Reset</em>, the authors Klaus Schwab and Thierry Malleret wrote that the pseudopandemic was:</p>
<blockquote><p>One of the least deadly pandemics the world has experienced over the last 2000 years….the consequences of COVID-19 in terms of health and mortality will be mild…It does not constitute an existential threat, or a shock that will leave its imprint on the world’s population for decades.”</p></blockquote>
<p>At the heart of this seizure of everything lies stakeholder capitalism. In December 2019 Schwab wrote <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20191203054643/https://time.com/5742066/klaus-schwab-stakeholder-capitalism-davos/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">What Kind of Capitalism Do We Want</a>. </p>
<p>The <em>“we”</em> referenced in that title was not <em>“us”</em> but rather the GPPP, though the article assumed we all agree on the GPPP’s definition of global problems. Schwab wrote:</p>
<blockquote><p>Stakeholder capitalism, a model I first proposed a half-century ago, positions private corporations as trustees of society, and is clearly the best response to today’s social and environmental challenges.”</p></blockquote>
<p>Schwab’s use of the term <em>“trustee”</em> is notable. It has a specific <a href="https://thelawdictionary.org/trustee/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">legal definition</a>:</p>
<blockquote><p>The person appointed, or required by law, to execute a trust; one in whom an estate, interest, or power is vested, under an express or implied agreement to administer or exercise it for the benefit or to the use of another.”</p></blockquote>
<p>It is not at all evident that global corporations should be entrusted with our society. Many of us would disagree which is one of the main reasons we haven’t been asked. There is no justification for Schwab’s claim.</p>
<p>I speak for no one but myself, but I would wager that most people consider global corporations to be a significant contributor to the social and environmental challenges we face. Why would anyone believe they should determine the alleged solutions?</p>
<p>Schwab’s is a ludicrous assertion. Yet this is the insistence of the <em>stakeholder capitalists. </em>It is also the basis for the UN Sustainable Development Goals and their Agenda 21 and 2030 policy platforms.</p>
<p>Despite their claims of omniscience, the GPPP and their leading proponents, like the WEF and the IMF, are not infallible. They are just people, no different in most regards to anyone else on Earth.</p>
<p>They are collaborating in a huge, though not unprecedented, global effort. Many people have come to think an operation on this scale is impossible. Why they imagine this is hard to say.</p>
<p>We have already had two world wars requiring similar degrees of <a href="https://www.corbettreport.com/wwi/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">international cooperation</a>. Arguably more if we consider that whole populations were engaged in these collective efforts.</p>
<p>There are many global corporations that operate tortuously complex international operations. These incorporate global logistics, international finance and cross border regulatory alignment. These world-wide endeavours overwhelmingly rely upon a hierarchical, authoritarian management structure. Only a few, senior board level figures have oversight of the whole system. The GPPP relies upon exactly the same.</p>
<p>However, because ordinary people are leading this organisation, mistakes happen. In September 2020 the WEF produced <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20201106025212/https://twitter.com/wef/status/799632174043561984" rel="noopener" target="_blank">a promotional video</a> making the point, from their perspective, that <em>“you will own nothing and you will be happy.”</em> This backfired terribly and was a PR disaster. The Video was hastily pulled down, too late to hide the real intention of the GPPP.</p>
<p>However, the original article, upon which the video was based, <a href="https://archive.is/BZW2Y" rel="noopener" target="_blank">can still be read</a>. The article was written by the former Danish Environment Minister, climate activist and WEF <em>“young global leader,”</em> <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20201124081850/https://www.weforum.org/agenda/authors/ida-auken" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Ida Auken</a>. Unlike most of us, she isn’t a disenfranchised constituent. Ida is a carefully selected GPPP spokeswoman.</p>
<div class="wp-caption aligncenter" id="attachment_78865" style="width: 660px"><a href="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/ida-auken-trump.jpg?x46269"><img alt="" aria-describedby="caption-attachment-78865" class="size-offg-body-image-650 wp-image-78865" decoding="async" height="333" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 650px) 100vw, 650px" src="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/ida-auken-trump-650x333.jpg?x46269" srcset="https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/ida-auken-trump-650x333.jpg 650w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/ida-auken-trump-500x256.jpg 500w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/ida-auken-trump-768x393.jpg 768w, https://off-guardian.org/wp-content/medialibrary/ida-auken-trump.jpg 795w" width="650"/></a><p class="wp-caption-text" id="caption-attachment-78865">Ida Auken</p></div>
<p>The title was changed and an explanatory note added. Ida said that her article was not intended to describe her <em>“utopia”</em> and that the intention was to explore the <em>“pros and cons”</em> of a possible near term future:</p>
<blockquote><p>Everything you considered a product, has now become a service… When AI and robots took over so much of our work, we suddenly had time to eat well, sleep well and spend time with other people… Once in a while I get annoyed about the fact that I have no real privacy. Nowhere I can go and not be registered. I know that, somewhere, everything I do, think and dream of is recorded. I just hope that nobody will use it against me… We had all these terrible things happening: lifestyle diseases, climate change, the refugee crisis, environmental degradation, completely congested cities, water pollution, air pollution, social unrest and unemployment. We lost way too many people before we realized that we could do things differently.”</p></blockquote>
<p>The offer from the GPPP is clear. In exchange for submitting to their will and allowing them sole possession of everything (the <em>global commons</em>) they will take care of us.</p>
<p>Why, is the obvious question. If they control all of the Earths resources, everything is free and AI and robots do most of the work, why do they need us? What is in it for them? We would no longer be required in such a system. Certainly loosing <em>“way too many people” </em>would suggest at least acknowledgment of a much smaller global population.</p>
<p>We should also note why Ida’s envisaged future becomes necessary. It is, just as we have seen with the COVID 19 <em>opportunity</em>, a response to a set of crises which gives rise to doing <em>“things differently.”</em></p>
<p>We are already seeing the knock-on effects of the COVID-19 lockdowns and economic destruction. An approaching set of crises over the next few years is a reasonable prediction.</p>
<p>As Schwab noted, there was no <em>existential threat</em>. The consequent disasters we are likely to face will be the result of policy promoted by GPPP representatives, like the World Health Organisation, not a respiratory disease.</p>
<p>It would be easy to dismiss Ida’s musings as simply the wishful thinking of an ideologue. In part, it probably is. However, when we <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200616051832/https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/content/documents/Agenda21.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank">look at Agenda 21</a> and 2030 an uncomfortable realisation dawns.</p>
<p>While the<a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20210614062955/https://sdgs.un.org/2030agenda" rel="noopener" target="_blank"> sustainable development agenda</a> is couched in terms of environmental concerns and apparent humanitarian principles, the detail of the proposed policies presents an entirely different prospect. </p>
<p>The true horror of Ida’s vision is not that she is among the tiny clique GPPP representatives who are committed to constructing this dystopian prison planet, it is that, in Agenda 21 and 2030, the policy framework to make <a href="https://futurescape.chathamhouse.org/?utm_source=chathamhouse.org&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=colab-piccadilly-2021&amp;utm_content=ch-expert-comment" rel="noopener" target="_blank">her futurescape</a> a reality already exists.</p>
<p>Make no mistake, the GPPP intend to control every aspect of the Earth and our lives. That is the transformation they are working towards and they have used the pseudopandemic to set that transition in motion. There is no political opposition to the GPPP. They are realpolitik entire. All they need, for their <em>“solutions”</em> to close the trap, is our compliance.</p>
<p>Combined with SDGs, while we have been preoccupied with a low mortality respiratory illness, the GPPP have not only started building, they have partly completed the new global monetary and financial system.</p>
<p>Once installed this will finalise their coup d’état and enable them to seize everything, all under the guise of stewardship of the global commons.</p>
<p>We will explore how this has been done, and the remaining elements needed to accomplish the theft, in Part Two.</p>
<h6>You can read more of Iain’s work at his blog <a href="https://in-this-together.com/anti-rationalist/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">In This Together</a> or on <a href="https://www.ukcolumn.org/writer/iain-davis" rel="noopener" target="_blank">UK Column</a> or follow him on <a href="https://twitter.com/_InThisTogether" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Twitter</a>. His new book <em>Pseudopandemic</em>, is now available, in both in kindle and paperback, from <a href="https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B097CZ3K7K" rel="noopener" target="_blank">Amazon</a> and other sellers. Or you can claim a free copy by <a href="https://in-this-together.com/books/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">subscribing to his newsletter</a>.</h6>

<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Nov 6, 2021 6:24 AM">

<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">

<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Anyone in “The West&amp;... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-448420" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-448420"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Anyone in “The West” who thinks that we live in “Freedom and Democracy” is deluded.</p>
<p>When it comes to the ‘theft of the Global Commons’, just remember this Old English Rhyme,</p>
<p>“The Law locks up the man or woman,<br/>
Who steals the Goose from off the Common<br/>
But leave the greater villain loose,<br/>
Who steals the Common from the Goose”…….</p>
</div>

<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=UK Column News – 27t... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445700" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445700"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>UK Column News – 27th October 2021</p>
<p><strong>Julian Assange Fight Against Extradition </strong><br/>
<em>U.S. suggests sending him to mental asylum </em><br/>
Journalist Afshin Rattansi Tweets: Crown Prosecution Service doing Biden’s bidding. Partner Stella Morris says U.S. retains right to impose “special measures” if Assange speaks publicly again. U.S. could imprison him in Australia; transfer him to maximum security prison if he ever comments. <br/>
Alex Thomson: extraditing anyone to the U.S. raises human rights concerns but the ADX SuperMax like Ted Kaczynski and the shoe bomber. Also, “special measures” are extra-judicial and go over the head of the courts. <br/>
The CPS has gone rogue and considers itself the equivalent of the federal prosecuting authorities in the U.S. or state prosecutors on the Continent. The CPS does not represent the people but a foreign power. </p>
<p>Assange Appeal In the Event The U.S. Gov Wins<br/>
<a href="https://www.crowdjustice.com/case/assangeappeal/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.crowdjustice.com/case/assangeappeal/</a></p>
<p><strong>Dan Andrews Takes Dictator Powers </strong><br/>
<em>Australia vulnerable because it has no bill of rights</em><br/>
News Corp — <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20211029074153/https://www.news.com.au/national/victoria/news/lawyers-blast-proposed-new-victorian-pandemic-legislation-for-giving-unlimited-power-to-state-leaders/news-story/c29c5cf1de2613478d222b824e840f5b" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Lawyers blast proposed new Victorian pandemic legislation for giving ‘unlimited power’ to state leaders </a><br/>
The Age — <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20211029192142/https://www.theage.com.au/politics/victoria/new-pandemic-laws-to-face-upper-house-amendments-so-what-s-in-them-20211028-p593y3.html" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">New pandemic laws to face upper house amendments: so what’s in them? </a><br/>
Alex Thomson: Ministers are officers of the Executive, masquerading as MPs. The only remedy is the shadow Attorney General or the Back Benchers. That leaves it to the courts to grow a pair.<br/>
See <a href="https://www.ukcolumn.org/search?keywords=dissidents" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">A Dissident’s Guide To The Constitution </a></p>
<p><a href="https://archive.md/dlTDy" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">BBC Uses Actress To Push Covid Jab </a><br/>
<em>Charlize Theron wants fairer distribution of vaccines — she’s </em><a href="https://www.fordfoundation.org/about/about-ford/a-legacy-of-social-justice/" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank"><em>in bed with Ford Foundation</em></a><em>. </em><br/>
Movies “School for Good and Evil” – the coven, three witches. <br/>
Alex Thomson: The Ford Foundation calls itself a social justice organization. Henry Ford’s idea of justice was to eliminate Jews. The Carnegie Endowments’ idea of justice was to promote war.<br/>
<a href="https://moneycircus.substack.com/p/spies-dupes-and-charities" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Moneycircus Substack — Spies, Dupes and Charities: Rivals for Power. The Tax-Exempt Foundations. </a><br/>
Ford Foundation is Highly Political, Getting People To Vote A Certain Way<br/>
Brian Gerrish: The BBC gives none of that background because if they did that would change the story of an actress encouraging vaccines.<br/>
Planned Parenthood, Child Transplants, <a href="https://tfn.org/" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Electoral Control</a><br/>
<a href="https://www.fordfoundation.org/about/people/board-of-trustees/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.fordfoundation.org/about/people/board-of-trustees/</a></p>
<p><strong>Amazon Cloud To Host UK Spy Agencies  </strong><br/>
Billion-pound secret deal, to be used during joint operations 00:26:30<br/>
Mike Robinson: the Fusion Doctrine means everything is a joint operation. <br/>
<a href="https://archive.md/n2cNB" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Financial Times</a> — Cloud contract for GCHQ, MI5 and MI6 with US tech group aims to speed analysis but likely to ignite sovereignty fears<br/>
Mike Robinson: whose initiative is this, because a year ago the Pentagon was saying they needed to get more intel services on to the cloud?<br/>
Alex Thomson (ex GCHQ) the contractors outnumber the officers. The point of civilian security, Signals Intel, is to find people who are up to no good. Military AI looks for people to shoot. When you start profiling the whole population you are in different territory.<br/>
What is not currently possible and is not mentioned here is that they want computers to zoom in, like the Third Reich Hollerith Department that will tell them, “these people are your enemies.”</p>
<p><strong>Amazon Storage System Used For Armaments on UK 5th-Gen Aircraft Carriers </strong><br/>
HMS Queen Elizabeth and HMS Prince of Wales.<br/>
Brian Gerrish: does Amazon builds the automated weapons systems – how are they involved?<br/>
<a href="https://snr.org.uk/the-mariners-mirror-podcast/the-first-sea-lord-admiral-sir-tony-radakin/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://snr.org.uk/the-mariners-mirror-podcast/the-first-sea-lord-admiral-sir-tony-radakin/</a></p>
<p><strong>The MSM Rehabilitate Christopher Steele </strong><br/>
<a href="https://news.sky.com/video/former-spy-russian-hostility-is-growing-12441855" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Sky News</a> — Former Spy: ‘Russian hostility is growing 00:40:00<br/>
Steele insists the majority of material is right.<br/>
Alex Thomson: He was one of the better ones, he is right to think that Britain has some enemies in the Kremlin but he is wrong to take the Richard Dearlove line, as Steele did when ran the Russia desk at Mi6 in 2006-09. It is not the only game in town in Moscow. It is not a zero sum where they will reach first for the nuclear option to defend their near abroad. <br/>
OTOH there has been a willingness to ignore the 1/4 million Russian expats moving to London and their millions finding their way into the coffers of the governing party. Steele is telling half the story. And Carole Cadwalladr is telling the other half of the story. It’s just that we can’t trust the motives of any of these people who get the ear of Sky News. <br/>
<a href="https://badboysofbrexit.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">https://badboysofbrexit.com/</a></p>
<p><strong>Insulate Britain Are Really Global Partnership Protestors </strong><br/>
<a href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-10132515/amp/The-ex-BBC-tech-chief-54-blocked-roads-central-London.html" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">BBC Tech Chief Tim Lancaster is Insulate Britain Protestor</a> 00:53:15<br/>
Network of connections reveals well-funded backers<br/>
Climate Strategies – tax-evading foundations, World Bank, EU, FCO, UK Gov.</p>
<p><strong>“Luxury communists” Channel Novara Media Deleted, Restored After MSM Outcry</strong><br/>
Censorship Only Applies To The Wrong People, The Right People Are Fine 00:55:15<br/>
Novara Media’s Gary McQuiggin deletes Tweets which praised right of “private companies” to censor — until it happened to him. <br/>
Ash Sarkar, luxury communist, who works for BBC, is one of the faces. <br/>
Alex Thomson: Novara got too hot for the establishment when it started interviewing the old left who are skeptics on the Lockdown measures. They fear a communist version of UK Column. </p>
<p><strong>Vaccine Passports Advert For Call Handlers </strong><br/>
“A brand new team to assist with the rollout of vaccine passports” 00:59:30<br/>
Unknown company – may be Serco<br/>
Brian Gerrish — this is the Gov lying to the public. You can be sure if the Gov is spending money, they have every intention of making it real. <br/>
Alex Thomson — it’s often the hiring of frontline staff that reveals the sub-contracting. Likewise Facebook still has adverts for close protection officers for COP26 — there’s not enough time to vet them. Is that the intention, somebody asked me.</p>
<p><strong>Asset or Useful Idiot Lucy Beresford Calls For Lockdowns For The Unvaccinated </strong><br/>
Another behavioural psychologist telling us what to do 01:02:15<br/>
Fomer Lehman Banker, Psychotherapist, Novelist, TedX speaker. <a href="https://www.lucyberesford.com/new-page" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Founder of the Kindness Club</a> tells BBC that 600-700,00 people have not had a single jab. </p>
<blockquote><p>“they are the ones who are putting us at risk… there is a moral pressure whre you feel the rest of us are doing our bit to break that link between infections and hospitalizations… to protect the NHS… at some point there must be some kind of penalty for that.”</p></blockquote>
<p>Mike Robinson – case numbers that have been going through the roof despite the vaccinations<br/>
Alex Thomson – the financial overlords of this planet like psychological techniques and to infantilize the people.</p>
<p><strong>The FDA Think Child Heart Problems Are A Price Worth Paying </strong><br/>
<a href="https://childrenshealthdefense.org/defender/chd-legal-action-fda-eua-pfizer-biontech-vaccine-children/" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">CHD to Sue FDA for ‘Recklessly Endangering’ Children </a></p>
<p><strong>German Authorities Say You Don’t Need To Know Mortality Statistics For The Vaxxed </strong><br/>
Weimar mayor will not release numbers treated in clinics who have been jabbed. 01:10:15<br/>
The information would play into the hands of Covid deniers and anti-vaxxers. <br/>
Cronna Doks: – <a href="https://bit.ly/3jIkzAO" rel="nofollow ugc">https://bit.ly/3jIkzAO</a><br/>
Alex Thomson: this is the same as the interior ministry during the migrant crisis that would not release data because it would frighten people.</p>
<p><a href="https://www.ukcolumn.org/ukcolumn-news/uk-column-news-27th-october-2021" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.ukcolumn.org/ukcolumn-news/uk-column-news-27th-october-2021</a></p>

The offer fr... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445543" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445543"></i></span>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>a minor error</p>
<blockquote><p>The offer from the GPPP is clear. In exchange for submitting to their will and allowing them sole possession of everything (the <em>global commons</em>) they will take care of us.</p></blockquote>
<p>They don’t need possession, I doubt they strive for it, because people might find this as over the top. Having control over is more than enough.</p>
<p>bigger error</p>
<blockquote><p>It is the self-serving belief that some <em>special</em> people are destined, and therefore have the right, to lead the rest of us. They don’t require any kind of legitimate <em>“democratic”</em> mandate or even popular support. Their claimed right to rule is an imperious assumption.</p></blockquote>
<p>These sentences contain implication that “elites” don’t have legitimacy at all.<br/>
Wrong.<br/>
They are effectively owners of all assets on the world. Property rights gives them some legitimacy, this is a fact.<br/>
Mini problem for them is they are not able to affirm legitimacy this way, because that would be beyond ugly. In general people still believe common matters are in the domain of demacrazzy, never mind that factually this belief is a dream.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">

<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">

<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I was passing the TV and c... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445264" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>

<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445264"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I was passing the TV and caught some impassioned geriatric hippy in a suit launching a diatribe about a seizure of the media and a clampdown on info. Oh, I thought, a little sliver of truth getting through? Of course not. It was one Roger McNamee complaining about how the media had been hijacked by the loony fringe via Facebook which now constituted a threat to our democracy and a danger to public health due to denial of … etc.<br/>
 <br/>
So how did that Talking Heads song go?<br/>
 </p>
<blockquote><p>Same as it ever was</p><p><p>Same as it ever was</p></p><p><p>Same as it ever was</p></p><p><p>Same as it ever was</p></p></blockquote>
</div>

</div>

</div><div id="wpdiscuz_form_anchor-445264_0"></div></div><div class="comment odd alt thread-even depth-1 wpd-comment wpd_comment_level-1" id="wpd-comm-445217_0"><div class="wpd-comment-wrap wpd-blog-user wpd-blog-subscriber">
<div class="wpd-comment-left">
<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="Wayne Vanderploeg" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/494c5dc74ac955bbf5a22eafb1b5791a?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/494c5dc74ac955bbf5a22eafb1b5791a?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-445217">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
Wayne Vanderploeg
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 28, 2021 6:18 PM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 28, 2021 6:18 PM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=In my past life as a natur... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445217" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445217"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>In my past life as a natural area management planner for the Forest Preserve District of Cook County (Illinois) I oversaw the management planning of roughly 50,000 acres of natural areas around the City of Chicago and the surrounding Cook County suburbs. About 11% or 70,000 acres of the county is Forest Preserve. It was, sort of, an extension of the Daniel Burnham plan for Chicago. Around 1915 the Illinois General Assembly gave every Illinois county the authority to create it’s own Forest Preserve system. Each has it’s own taxing body. All of the “collar counties” surrounding Chicago used the authority to form their own organizations. Amazingly, from that, hundreds of thousands of acres in northeastern Illinois have been preserved. Some say it originated with the women’s garden club of Chicago who, around the turn of the last century, regularly toured around the area visiting natural areas that had yet to be developed. Through their efforts, the concept of protecting them from development was created. That then grew into the idea of a Forest Preserve System. Because of the unique nature of the region which contains multiple biomes, large numbers of threatened and endangered species are surviving. Nearly 80 of them are found within a short distance of the city of Chicago, if not in the city. A truly remarkable place that has drawn attention Worldwide. </p>
<p>Roughly 15 years ago a group of not-for-profits dreamed up the idea of creating an all encompassing organization that could help coordinate the management of rare species and habitat while generating a stronger interest in funding the protection and management of these natural areas. Although, the State of Illinois already had such a process in place. They already had the authority, personnel and budget to do it. They just were not doing it well enough for “some people”.</p>
<p>The organization was called Chicago Wilderness. A not-for-profit whose primary funding, ironically, came from the landowners themselves. They modeled themselves after the United Nations and their primary goal was “sustainability”. Sound familiar? It was OK at first. Meeting after meeting with other “stakeholders” developing rules and guidelines. Identifying regional problems and solutions to be use as a guide to ensure that all of the Forest Preserve systems had common goals. For decades we had already been working with each other and the State to do that very thing. We frequently shared ideas and information, unbeknownst to Chicago Wilderness founders. False assumptions were made.</p>
<p>It became an overpopulated administration monster that wanted more and more money as it attempted to grow and get it’s tentacles into everything. It eventually became hostile. </p>
<p>They wanted all of the regional species and habitat data placed into a centralized GIS based database that was fully accessible to every Chicago Wilderness member. This included the State of Illinois data. I am laughing as I write this. I can only imagine the look on my face when the other members of the executive committee told me their plan. I said, “we would rather destroy our data than do that”. I retired a few years later but before doing so instructed my underlings of their plan and suggested that they do anything and everything necessary to keep the data out of the Chicago Wilderness database. By that time, Chicago Wilderness had hundreds of members out of which, at least, 90% were not-for-profit organizations that did not own any land. Each was given an equal voice. </p>
<p>Essentially, they were attempting to circumvent elected county boards and the taxpayers themselves. I spent years pointing out the obvious. Once they lost their funding Chicago Wilderness was done. The Forest Preserve boards figured it out and axed them. They tried to develop a political wedge to force continued funding. The loss in votes was small and everyone survived. Now they are gone and forgotten. </p>
<p>Oligarchs will stop funding these efforts in the United Nations once they figure out they are not working. Our politicians need to be redirected. Information is power. The fake studies on climate change are the driving force. Just like the effort to meld the Forest Preserve and State of Illinois databases. The generation of the annual climate assessment is a prime example of why the United Nations should not be acquiring and manipulating data at any level. We need to defund the United Nations. See how long the oligarchs continue to dump money into the all encompassing administration octopus once they figure out their plan is no longer being financially supported by the richest country in the World. It was genius for Trump to pull the funding. However, it kept him from getting reelected because of the political power that’s been amassed by the United Nations. We need to go after them. As everyone knows, they ARE the tool fueling this mess. Develop an association of conservative countries. Or something like that. </p>
<p>We could just stall for 8 years and say, “see”. Actually, we only have about 5 or 6 years to go. We can stall that long, can’t we?</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

</div>

<a href="#comment-445217">

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>“a group of not-for-profits dreamed up the idea of creating an all encompassing organization that could help coordinate…”</p>
<p>Alarm bells started ringing in my head. Then I read on:</p>
<p>“It became an overpopulated administration monster that wanted more and more money as it attempted to grow and get it’s tentacles into everything. It eventually became hostile.”</p>
<p>The Chicago Wilderness PR monster withered when the public money tap was turned off; I know too little about Chicago politics to decide whether this was a happy ending. However, there seems to be a moral in this story: beware of Con-philanthropists who Con-ordinate public affairs, because eventually they will extract far more than they donated to the public purse; example, Con-19 and WHO.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">

<a href="#comment-445210">
Judith

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>WION -The World is One News, examines global issues with in-depth analysis. We provide much more than the news of the day. Our aim to empower people to explore their world. With our Global headquarters in New Delhi, we bring you news on the hour, by the hour. We deliver information that is not biased. We are journalists who are neutral to the core and non-partisan when it comes to the politics of the world. People are tired of biased reportage and we stand for a globalised united world. So for us the World is truly One.<br/>
<a href="https://youtube.com/c/WION/videos" rel="nofollow ugc">https://youtube.com/c/WION/videos</a></p>
<p>I haven’t seen much from them, only few videos. They upload a lot.</p>
</div>

</div><div id="wpdiscuz_form_anchor-445413_445194"></div></div></div><div class="comment even thread-even depth-1 wpd-comment wpd_comment_level-1" id="wpd-comm-445193_0"><div class="wpd-comment-wrap wpd-blog-guest">
<div class="wpd-comment-left">
<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="George Mc" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-445193">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
George Mc
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 28, 2021 4:39 PM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 28, 2021 4:39 PM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=I have been hearing a phra... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445193" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445193"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I have been hearing a phrase more and more often recently: “a different breed”. It was always used with reference to those who managed to work their way up into the higher echelons of the council – but I’m sure it could work in other organisations too. And it reminded me of a similar sentiment from Gore Vidal towards the end of his life – something he repeated so often and even with such stridency that I had the feeling he was seriously trying to get a message through before he kicked it. He was referring to the Republicans but it applies all across the political spectrum: there is certain type of person who resides in these high reaches, whether born into them or having pushed into them.<br/>
 <br/>
It’s the kind of person who has none of the sense of obligation, responsibility, compassion or even shame that resides in the folk down below. It’s the type who never even thinks about causing damage to others, who lies and cheats as a matter of instinct and who experiences no embarrassment about being found out but can instantly weasel his way out of any accusation by casting it back at the accuser.<br/>
 <br/>
It seems to be invariably these people who commandeer the resources, the time, the money etc. of society. And who can instantly pervert every endeavour to benefit themselves.<br/>
 <br/>
The Ickean/Lovecraftian obsession with all things reptilian has a resonance here. These individuals are something less than human although generally more potent. They are trapped in a lower level of thought and feeling – which works to their advantage.<br/>
 <br/>
Furthermore, they are instinctive predators who know how to weaken and overcome others. They know that psychology is the key factor, that weakening a person’s mental/spiritual constitution will inevitably lead to a diminishing of physical health.<br/>
 <br/>
For I have also been hearing about cases of people who have died of physical ailments but whose conditions were worsened – or even caused – by psychological trauma – often bereavement. And of course, covid is the most potent “opportunity” to destroy the moral of the majority of the public.<br/>
 <br/>
Thus, to switch metaphors, covid has been in effect a launching of the wolves into the fold. </p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">
<div class="wpd-vote">
<div class="wpd-vote-up wpd_not_clicked">

</div>
<div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-like" title="0">0</div><div class="wpd-vote-result-sep"></div><div class="wpd-vote-result wpd-vote-result-dislike" title="0">0</div>

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Quandt And The Post-War Or... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445172" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445172"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p><a href="https://moneycircus.substack.com/p/quandt-and-the-post-war-order" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">Quandt And The Post-War Order — Part 2: the WW2 settlement cloak plans to revive the fascist project?</a><br/>
Advance copy for paid subscribers only but here’s the intro and premise:</p>
<p>Is there such a thing as fascist technology and, if not, can a technocrat be fascist? A somewhat silly question in search of a serious answer. Technology, on its own, is amoral: it goes; it does. It must be guided to good or evil purposes.</p>
<p>This was a popular view at the end of WW2. Technology that was evil in NAZI hands ceased to be so when exported to the United States where scientists who had been NAZIs continued their research as American citizens. The Nuremberg Code on medical experimentation was almost immediately ignored.</p>
<p>Several key industries and business people at the heart of the Third Reich received perfunctory punishment at the Nuremberg trials. Some weren’t prosecuted at all. This is the story of the Quandt family, Germany’s richest and the owners of BMW, and one of the last corporate dynasties to confront its NAZI past.</p>
<p>There is, in the Quandt saga, something of the behind-the-scenes manipulation that is the hallmark of Event Covid: of political and corporate intrigue; of juntas, cliques and leagues; of a fateful turning of brother against brother; the multitudes teetering on the brink of uncertainty while the few gain fantastical surplus security.</p>
<p>Talk of deadlines that shift but at the end of which transformation there looms a terminus — in the words of Bill Gates, “the final solution.” A whiff not of everyday corruption but of something choreographed on a supra-national scale, that aligns with unseen vested interests. Not of furtive kickbacks or greased palms but of handsome recompense for playing their allotted role in history, like the other big gears in a clock.</p>
<p>They still influence the pendulum today and they are busy at the forefront of the bio-security state.</p>
<p><a href="https://moneycircus.substack.com/p/quandt-and-the-post-war-order" rel="nofollow ugc">https://moneycircus.substack.com/p/quandt-and-the-post-war-order</a></p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

<p>This is part 2 of <a href="https://moneycircus.substack.com/p/nazi-bargain-and-the-post-war-order" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">NAZI Bargain And The Post-War Order — Did the WW2 settlement cloak plans to revive the fascist project?</a></p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Globalist think-tank founded by a billionaire Chicago banker comes up with totalitarian blueprint to save the world from climate change shock:</p>
<p><a href="https://www.wri.org/research/state-climate-action-2021" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.wri.org/research/state-climate-action-2021</a></p>
<p>Is the Fraud: a) giving this laudatory and prominent coverage? b) ignoring it? c) dissecting it for the insanity it is? d) about to publish a George Monbiot article complaining it doesn’t go far enough?</p>

<a href="#comment-445128">
Edwige

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Why does everyone on the “Alt Right” think the planet is a creation of the Rockefeller/Rothchild syndicate? And that the climate and all the planet’s resources were invented by this syndicate?</p>
<p>Could it just be – just possibly be – that if the climate ceases being friendly to business interests and resources stop flowing freely from the ground…then the joyride is over, fini, take a hike ruling elites, over the rainbow and out the window? </p>
<p>And that they really are in a panic that they might soon lose their iron grip on the planet? and have to start living like ordinary people?</p>
<p>And that that’s why they’re in the process of wrapping up the economy – the real economy, the one based on reality – and starting to base their “wealth and power” on monies created out of thin air? which the peasants will continue paying for until even they can no longer pretend everything’s fine and tickety-boo dandy?</p>
<p>In other words, Earth is at no man’s mercy; and it doesn’t give a hoot what people want it to do or be or become; nor does it give a rat’s ass how man defines it (“God’s gift to Man” or whatever).</p>
<p>Earth to Man: “You ain’t the boss of me!”</p>
</div>

<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445259"></i></span>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-445218">
Judith
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>In <u>Dancing Naked in the Mind Field</u>, Kary Mullis expresses similar skepticism; he doesn’t call it “delusional hubris”, but that’s what it amounts to.</p>
<p>I was surprised by his perspective, although once I reflected upon it I realized I shouldn’t have been.</p>
<p>If you haven’t read the memoir, I strongly recommend it; here’s a link to a free download: <a href="https://b-ok.cc/book/2554776/7020c4" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">https://b-ok.cc/book/2554776/7020c4</a></p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Excellent article again Iain, thank you. Ida Auken, yet another soulless minion churned out by the Young Global Leaders program. Just like Jacinda Ardern, Angela Merkel, Emmanuel Macron and many others who are all in Lockstep, and foot soldiers bringing about this vile and grotesque agenda.<br/>
These people have been put in place specifically for this event, imo.<br/>
Incidentally, Wikispooks gives a good run down on the Young Global Leaders programme, and provides lists of names of past graduates, and where they ended up.<br/>
And most people are still completely oblivious to all this. Not a clue. I told some of my customers, and two magazine staff members early this year that creatures like Schwab intended to usher in a technofascist nightmare – the equivalent of a digitalised 1984, and they looked at me with incomprehension and almost pity.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>“They don’t feel safe unless they trot out what the group thinks.”</p>
<p>Safety in numbers, the age old evolutionary principle of Herd Security. The more indistinguishable I am from the rest of the herd, the less likely I am to be singled out for a dangerous or difficult task.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Boris Johnson goes on TV to announce that the covid injection 1. Wont stop you getting Covid, and 2. Will not stop you spreading Covid after an injection ‘shot’. Those who knew this from the start will not be surprised. But the cat now seems well and truly to be out of the bag. The whole covid meme is going to be an increasingly hard sell. Hey no-one at least 95% are wearing face masks where I live and I think this is going to continue. Not wishing to sound smug some of us knew this from the start. But more and more are coming around to the nonsense of the covid bullshit. And to think that the market cap of Pfizer, Astra-Zeneca, Johnson and Johnson and Moderna have shot up through the atmosphere. Even those minions who inject the poison are getting £10 per shot – criminals!</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I’d love to agree that this will produce a “great awakening” – but my experience is that a combination of annual flu jabs and boosters for those who travel abroad means that the normies I’ve spoken to all see no problem with this. It’s going to take personal experience of an adverse effect to wake some people up (and even that won’t do it for some). </p>
<p>The crucial thing with those who might be persuadable is the phoniness of the pandemic and the vaccines, not the number of boosters. This is why the mainstream are throwing everything at toxifying even looking at those arguments – if you do so, you are a really bad person or endangering yourself. It’s a deliberate strategy that Ice Age Farmer had found in NATO documentation.</p>
</div>

Reply to 
<a href="#comment-445198">
Pilgrim Shadow
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Indeed. We will get nowhere hoping for them to make mistakes. If they are, in fact, <a href="https://arrby.wordpress.com/2020/08/26/covid-19-what-the-heqt/" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">guided by demons</a>, Are they going to make the kind of mistakes that we need them to?</p>
<p>I don’t advocate doing nothing of course. There’s an old saying: “God helps those who help themselves.” I think there’s truth in that, although I would add that it depends on what you’re trying to do. If you’re just trying to survive, and be a good neighbor, friend, husband, etc, and resist the destructive actions of predators, God will have your back, as long as you acknowledge and respect him.</p>
</div>

<p>The Pyramid of Power: Chapter 7 – Big Pharma and the Medical Cartel<br/>
<a href="https://theconsciousresistance.com/the-pyramid-of-power-chapter-7-big-pharma-and-the-medical-cartel/" rel="noopener nofollow ugc" target="_blank">The Pyramid of Power: Chapter 7 – Big Pharma and the Medical Cartel – The Conscious Resistance Network</a></p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>I really enjoyed the audio feature you trialed last week. I would like to vote for it to be a regular feature. I’m sure it took a while to organise and complete but I think it could help you reach a new audience! It’s not that I’m too lazy to read but sometimes it’s nice to do 2 things at once. Like listen to enlightening articles being read out by a chap with a charming British actor voice while cooking my dinner. Reading this article was great, but now I’m hungry.</p>

<div class="wpd-avatar">
<img alt="George Mc" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" decoding="async" height="64" loading="lazy" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=64&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/5fdd943d9ddc48d0d81f2f9071aee6d4?s=128&amp;d=monsterid&amp;r=pg 2x" width="64"/>

<div class="wpd-comment-right" id="comment-445068">
<div class="wpd-comment-header">
<div class="wpd-comment-author">
George Mc
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-date" title="Oct 28, 2021 8:01 AM">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="far fa-clock"></i>
Oct 28, 2021 8:01 AM
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-share wpd-hidden wpd-tooltip wpd-top">
<i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-share-alt"></i>
<div class="wpd-tooltip-content">
<a class="wc_tw" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=This is beyond pathetic:
h... &amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Foff-guardian.org%2F2021%2F10%2F27%2Fseizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1%2F%23comment-445068" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Twitter"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-twitter wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_vk" href="https://vk.com/share.php?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On VKontakte"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-vk wpf-cta"></i></a><a class="wc_ok" href="https://connect.ok.ru/offer?url=https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/" rel="noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Share On Odnoklassniki"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fab fa-odnoklassniki wpf-cta"></i></a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-space"></div>
<div class="wpd-comment-link wpd-hidden">
<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445068"></i></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>This is beyond pathetic:</p>
<p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2021/oct/27/demonstrators-take-to-streets-across-uk-to-protest-against-spiking-epidemic" rel="nofollow ugc">https://www.theguardian.com/society/2021/oct/27/demonstrators-take-to-streets-across-uk-to-protest-against-spiking-epidemic</a></p>
<blockquote><p>Demonstrators take to streets across UK to protest against ‘spiking epidemic’</p><p><p></p></p><p><p>Protests and nightclub boycotts in more than 40 areas as police disclose 254 reports of spiking in two months</p></p><p><p></p></p><p><p>Protesters holding banner saying ‘we deserve to feel safe’</p></p><p><p></p></p><p><p>Manchester protestors are boycotting nightclubs in the city as part of the nationwide anti-spiking campaign. </p></p></blockquote>
<p>So people are “united by a common fury” against “drink spiking”? </p>
<p>There is a “spiking epidemic” and its “sweeping the UK” and “they are spiking us with needles now too.”</p>
<p>Women have “stopped buying drinks in clubs to stay safe”.</p>
<p>But here’s the biggest laugh:</p>
<blockquote><p>“The only injection I want is Pfizer!” said one of the many banners on show. </p></blockquote>
<p>And women are OK but if you want major wokeness:</p>
<blockquote><p>The nationwide protests were originally billed as Girls’ Night In but organisers changed the name to become more inclusive. One of the Manchester organisers, George Virgo, is a trans man, who said he had experienced gender-based violence when perceived as a woman.</p></blockquote>
<p>But something is missing, surely? Of course – <strong><em>the statistics!</em></strong></p>
<blockquote><p>Figures released on Wednesday reveal 56 incidents of spiking by injection were recorded by police in England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland in September and October, in addition to 198 confirmed reports of drink spiking.</p></blockquote>
<p>Note what is happening here: the deflection from anger against the covid con, the transferral from fear of vax injection to a whipped up fear of date rape drug injection, a little juggle from “covid spike” to this new “drug spike”, and of course the all-pervasive wokeness. </p>
<p>In the light of all this, Kier Starmer catching covid pales into boredom.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Function-stacking is always a reliable tell that an event is astro-turfed (the vax, terrorising women into staying at home, transgenderism – they don’t go to all the trouble of getting the local lodges out for just one agenda!).</p>
<p>I wonder if this spiking story is a mockery of people’s fear of needles that is stopping some getting vaccinated? Merck’s Convid pill is in the pipeline for that.</p>
</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<blockquote><p>I<span>n the light of all this, Kier Starmer catching covid pales into boredom.</span></p></blockquote>
<p>Anyone know if Kier has been Stabbed? I’m sure he must have been. I heard (accidentally) Sunak begin his Budget statement by offering his most sincere (I am sure…) sympathy to Starmer in his time of woe. He wasted a perfect opportunity to publicly ask why, if this blinkin’ vaccine is so bloody good, why had Kier caught the pox, sorry “covid”?</p>
<p>I am joking, of course, but only slightly.</p>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>But that would make no difference. My ‘awaiting spam check’ comments don’t seem to ever disappear for that long. But I haven’t carefully tracked everything I post, so maybe some have. I don’t know. I really just accept this system as a necessary evil and don’t worry about it. I’m focussed on what I do and ‘say’.</p>

<span wpd-tooltip="Comment Link" wpd-tooltip-position="left"><i aria-hidden="true" class="fas fa-link" data-wpd-clipboard="https://off-guardian.org/2021/10/27/seizing-everything-the-theft-of-the-global-commons-part-1/#comment-445137"></i></span>

<div class="wpd-reply-to">
<i class="far fa-comments"></i>
Reply to 
<a href="#comment-445113">
Gezzah Potts
</a>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>To me, the downvotes say far more than the upvotes about the audience that’s reading the comments. This is because it’s much easier to upvote a comment that appeals to the emotions; whereas one has to think about something one dislikes or disagrees with.</p>
</div>
<div class="wpd-comment-footer">

</div>

<div class="wpd-comment-text">
<p>Okay… like I said, I’m not fussed either way, but I know some people were getting a bit annoyed about every comment being downvoted numerous times by one of the trolls here.</p>
</div>
